CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing District Alpha relative to Stellar City Core?
SRP.A: District Alpha is {above} Stellar City Core in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {District Alpha}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Stellar City Core}.

VE.Q: What is Stellar City Core's Life Expectancy in 1993?
VE.A: Stellar City Core's life expectancy in 1993 is {77.66} years.

VE.Q: What is District Alpha's Life Expectancy in 1994?
VE.A: District Alpha's life expectancy in 1994 is {92.45} years.

VE.Q: What is Stellar City Core's Life Expectancy in 1992?
VE.A: Stellar City Core's life expectancy in 1992 is {79.81} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Life Expectancy in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum life expectancy is {75.16} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Life Expectancy in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum life expectancy is {92.45} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Life Expectancy level recorded for District Alpha?
EVJ.A: District Alpha reached approximately {92.45} years in {1994}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Life Expectancy level recorded for District Alpha?
EVJ.A: District Alpha's lowest recorded level is approximately {80.45} years in {1992}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Life Expectancy?
SC.A: The average total life expectancy is {164.16} years.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Life Expectancy exceed 165.82 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Life Expectancy go below 162.88 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1994, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1993 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 1992 and 1994 was {lower} than between 1993 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1993, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1993 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1992 and 1993 was {larger} than between 1993 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1993, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1992 and 1993 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 1992 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in 1992 was {lower} than in 1993.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {District Alpha} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Stellar City Core, District Alpha}.
